cytokine storms triggered by influenza infection. IL-6 plays an important role in protecting against influenza A virus as it is required for viral clearance. the protection against H5N1 by EAP treatment is less likely to cause drug resistance. treatment with EAP effectively inhibits H5N1 viral replication and improves animal survival.
